dialog.text: Huh? Why are you talking to me? Another admirer...?
Well, it is kind of refreshing to be around someone who isn't distracted by my looks.

options.option: You have kind of an unusual style.
Are you a guy or a girl?

dialog.text: You actually want to know? Uh, well, I really enjoy watching movies. It's kind of a hobby of mine.
Why is everyone so obsessed with my gender!?
Anyway. I'm kind of bored. Would be nice to see someone do something really impressive with that ball over there.

options.option: Did you see what I did?

dialog.text: Wow, that was pretty impressive! I guess you're not too bad.*I don't have anything to do tonight, so I could use some company.
Yeah, I guess I could go see a movie. I'll pick what we watch though! I'll see you there in three hours.
Oh, you came back? You want to go out after all?
